quests.desc: Welcome to another life changing session of TextWorld! Here is how to play! First thing I need you to do is to make sure that the type 3 locker within the kitchenette is unlocked. And then, doublecheck that the type 3 locker is wide open. And then, recover the type 6 latchkey from the type 3 locker. And then, unlock the type 6 chest in the kitchenette. After unlocking the type 6 chest, doublecheck that the type 6 chest in the kitchenette is ajar. And then, take the key from the type 6 chest. After picking up the key, check that the safe inside the kitchenette is unlocked with the key. And then, ensure that the safe is open. And then, take the blender from the safe inside the kitchenette. And then, sit the blender on the table within the kitchenette. And if you do that, you're the winner!
commands: unlock type 3 locker with type 3 passkey
take type 6 latchkey from type 3 locker
unlock type 6 chest with type 6 latchkey
unlock type 3 locker with type 3 passkey
take type 6 latchkey from type 3 locker
unlock type 6 chest with type 6 latchkey

infos.name: kitchenette
infos.desc:
You are in a kitchenette. An ordinary kind of place.

 You make out [if c_0 is locked]a locked[else if c_0 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] safe.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_0]. You check the price tag glued to the safe. Thirty big ones?! That's ridiculous! I got this person, their roommate works for the store, who could get you one of those for 75 bucks![end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The safe is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You see a type 6 chest.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The type 6 chest contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You can see [if c_2 is locked]a locked[else if c_2 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] type 3 locker, which looks normal, in the room.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The type 3 locker contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The type 3 locker is empty, what a horrible day![end if] Look out! It's a- oh, never mind, it's just a table. You shudder, but continue examining the table. [if there is something on the s_0]You see [a list of things on the s_0] on the table. You shudder, but continue examining the room.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of junk. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

 There is [if d_5 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading east. There is [if d_6 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading west.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
You've entered a study. You can barely contain your excitement.



 There is [if d_6 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading east. There is [if d_7 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading north.

infos.name: cookhouse
infos.desc:
You arrive in a standard kind of place. That is to say, you're in a cookhouse. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'



 There is [if d_5 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading west. There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading east.

infos.name: washroom
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the washroom. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.



 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading north. There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading west.

infos.name: dish-pit
infos.desc:
You've entered a dish-pit.



 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading north. There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading south. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: canteen
infos.desc:
You arrive in a canteen. A standard kind of place.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: restroom
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a restroom.

 You can make out a shelf. The shelf is usual.[if there is something on the s_1] On the shelf you see [a list of things on the s_1]. You shudder, but continue examining the room.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] wooden gateway leading north. There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading south. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a chamber. An usual kind of place. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.

 You can see [if c_3 is locked]a locked[else if c_3 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] chest here.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The chest is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
You arrive in an office. An usual kind of place.

 You make out a chair. The chair is standard.[if there is something on the s_2] On the chair you can make out [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] But the thing is empty, unfortunately. Sometimes, just sometimes, TextWorld can just be the worst.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: laundry place
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a laundry place. An ordinary kind of place.

 You see a spherical locker.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The spherical locker contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The spherical locker is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a bench. The bench is normal.[if there is something on the s_3] On the bench you see [a list of things on the s_3]. Something scurries by right in the corner of your eye. Probably nothing.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3] But the thing is empty, unfortunately. Aw, and here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if] You can see a rack. [if there is something on the s_4]You see [a list of things on the s_4] on the rack. Wow! Just like in the movies![end if][if there is nothing on the s_4]But there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

 There is [if d_7 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading south. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an unblocked exit to the north.

There is an unguarded exit to the north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: salon
infos.desc:
Wow! You're in a salon.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: playroom
infos.desc:
I just think it's great that you've just entered a playroom.



There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
You are in a studio. A typical one.

 You see a stand. The stand is usual.[if there is something on the s_5] On the stand you see [a list of things on the s_5].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5] But the thing hasn't got anything on it. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if] Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's a bookshelf. The bookshelf is typical.[if there is something on the s_6] On the bookshelf you make out [a list of things on the s_6].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6] Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a vault.

 If you haven't noticed it already, there seems to be something there by the wall, it's a counter. [if there is something on the s_7]You see [a list of things on the s_7] on the counter.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7]The counter appears to be empty. What's the point of an empty counter?[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] oak portal leading east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

You've just walked into a laundromat. You start to take note of what's in the room.



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] oak portal leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: cubicle

You arrive in a cubicle. A typical kind of place.

 You can see a mantelpiece. Make a note of this, you might have to put stuff on or in it later on. [if there is something on the s_8]You see [a list of things on the s_8] on the mantelpiece. Hmmm... what else, what else?[end if][if there is nothing on the s_8]But there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] wooden gateway leading south. There is an unguarded exit to the north.

infos.name: scullery
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the scullery. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.



You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south.

 You can see [if c_5 is locked]a locked[else if c_5 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] box.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The box contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] What a letdown! The box is empty![end if] You can see a workbench. [if there is something on the s_9]On the workbench you can see [a list of things on the s_9].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_9]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of junk.[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the north.

walkthrough: unlock type 3 locker with type 3 passkey
take type 6 latchkey from type 3 locker
unlock type 6 chest with type 6 latchkey

objective: Who's got a virtual machine and is about to play through an profound round of TextWorld? You do! Here is how to play! First off, if it's not too much trouble, I need you to look and see that the type 3 locker is unlocked with the type 3 passkey. After that, open the type 3 locker within the kitchenette. Then, pick up the type 6 latchkey from the type 3 locker in the kitchenette. Having taken the type 6 latchkey, doublecheck that the type 6 chest in the kitchenette is unlocked. And then, ensure that the type 6 chest in the kitchenette is open. After that, take the key from the type 6 chest. Once you have got the key, check that the safe is unlocked with the key. After unlocking the safe, ensure that the safe is open. And then, recover the blender from the safe inside the kitchenette. And then, rest the blender on the table in the kitchenette. And if you do that, you're the winner!
